# Jumping
## Overview
**Aura** faint transmutation; **CL** 2th

**Slot** ring

**Price** 2,500 gp

**Weight** â€”

**Description**

This ring continually allows the wearer to leap about, providing a +5 competence bonus on all his [[Acrobatics (Skill)|Acrobatics]] checks made to make high or long jumps.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Forge Ring (Feat)|Forge Ring]], creator must have 5 ranks in the [[Acrobatics (Skill)|Acrobatics]] skill

**Cost** 1,250 gp

**Source:** Core Rulebook, pg. 481
